vote.title: Authorize an increase in the contract (1) for additional funding to the 2024 Annual Street Maintenance Improvement Contract to complete the projects proposed in the 2024 Annual Street Maintenance Improvement Contract, in an amount not to exceed $21,290,118.00, increasing the contract from $85,160,474.50 to $106,450,592.50; and (2) extend the term of the contact to an additional 180 calendar days to complete the projects proposed in the contract - Not to exceed $21,290,118.00, from $85,160,474.50 to $106,450,592.50 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriation)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the contract (1) for additional funding to the 2024 Annual Street Maintenance Improvement Contract to complete the projects proposed in the 2024 Annual Street Maintenance Improvement Contract, in an amount not to exceed $21,290,118.00, increasing the contract from $85,160,474.50 to $106,450,592.50; and (2) extend the term of the contact to an additional 180 calendar days to complete the projects proposed in the contract - Not to exceed $21,290,118.00, from $85,160,474.50 to $106,450,592.50 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriation)
